name: PawfectLand
description: A whimsical and enchanting world where kittens of all elements coexist in harmony, fostering a sense of wonder and unity among its feline inhabitants.

name: Norse Mythology
description: Rooted in the ancient beliefs of the people of Scandinavia, presents a rich and complex universe filled with powerful gods, mythical creatures, and epic tales that have left an enduring mark on world folklore.

name: Deep Space
description: Infinite expanse beyond our solar system, where the universe extends into the unknown, filled with galaxies, stars, planets, and the mysteries of cosmic wonders.
